verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> in the fifteenth <S%G4003><s%> year <S%G2094><s%> of the reign <S%G2231><s%> of Tiberius <S%G5086><s%> Caesar, <S%G2541><s%> when Pontius <S%G4194><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> was governor <S%G2230><s%> of Judea, <S%G2453><s%> and Herod <S%G2264><s%> was tetrarch <S%G5067><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and his brother <S%G80><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> was tetrarch <S%G5067><s%> of the region <S%G5561><s%> of Ituraea <S%G2484><s%> and Trachonitis, <S%G5139><s%> and Lysanias <S%G3078><s%> was tetrarch <S%G5067><s%> of Abilene,

in the high <S%G749><s%> priesthood <S%G749><s%> of Annas <S%G452><s%> and Caiaphas, <S%G2533><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> to John, <S%G2491><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Zacharias, <S%G2197><s%> in the wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>

And he came <S%G2064><s%> into all <S%G3956><s%> the district <S%G4066><s%> around <S%G4066><s%> the Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> a baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> for the forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins; <S%G266><s%>

as it is written <S%G1125><s%> in the book <S%G976><s%> of the words <S%G3056><s%> of Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> "The voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> 'Make <S%G2090><s%> ready <S%G2090><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> His paths <S%G5147><s%> straight. <S%G2117><s%>

'Every <S%G3956><s%> ravine <S%G5327><s%> shall be filled <S%G4137><s%> up, And every <S%G3956><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> and hill <S%G1015><s%> shall be brought <S%G5013><s%> low; <S%G5013><s%> And the crooked <S%G4646><s%> shall become <S%G1510><s%> <S%G1519><s%> straight, <S%G2117><s%> And the rough <S%G5138><s%> roads <S%G3598><s%> smooth; <S%G3006><s%>
And all <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> shall see <S%G3708><s%> the salvation <S%G4992><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>'"

He therefore <S%G3767><s%> [began] saying <S%G3004><s%> to the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> who were going <S%G1607><s%> out to be baptized <S%G907><s%> by him, "You brood <S%G1081><s%> of vipers, <S%G2191><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> warned <S%G5263><s%> you to flee <S%G5343><s%> from the wrath <S%G3709><s%> to come <S%G3195><s%>?

"Therefore <S%G3767><s%> bring <S%G4160><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> fruits <S%G2590><s%> in keeping <S%G514><s%> with repentance, <S%G3341><s%> and do not begin <S%G757><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> to yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> 'We have <S%G2192><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> for our father, <S%G3962><s%>' for I say <S%G3004><s%> to you that God <S%G2316><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> from these <S%G3778><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> to raise <S%G1453><s%> up children <S%G5043><s%> to Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

"And also <S%G2532><s%> the axe <S%G513><s%> is already <S%G2235><s%> laid <S%G2749><s%> at the root <S%G4491><s%> of the trees; <S%G1186><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that does not bear <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> is cut <S%G1581><s%> down <S%G1581><s%> and thrown <S%G906><s%> into the fire. <S%G4442><s%>"
And the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> were questioning <S%G1905><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Then <S%G3767><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall we do <S%G4160><s%>?"

And he would answer <S%G611><s%> and say <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Let the man who has <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> tunics <S%G5509><s%> share <S%G3330><s%> with him who has <S%G2192><s%> none; <S%G3361><s%> and let him who has <S%G2192><s%> food <S%G1033><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> likewise. <S%G3668><s%>"
And [some] tax-gatherers also <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to be baptized, <S%G907><s%> and they said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall we do <S%G4160><s%>?"
And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Collect <S%G4238><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> more <S%G4183><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> what you have been ordered <S%G1299><s%> to."

And [some] soldiers <S%G4754><s%> were questioning <S%G1905><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "And [what <S%G5101><s%> about] us, what shall we do <S%G4160><s%>?" And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Do not take <S%G1286><s%> money <S%G1286><s%> from anyone <S%G3367><s%> by force, <S%G1286><s%> or <S%G3366><s%> accuse <S%G4811><s%> [anyone] falsely, <S%G4811><s%> and be content <S%G714><s%> with your wages. <S%G3800><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> while the people <S%G2992><s%> were in a state <S%G4328><s%> of expectation <S%G4328><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> were wondering <S%G1260><s%> in their hearts <S%G2588><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> as to whether <S%G3379><s%> he might be the Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them all, <S%G3956><s%> "As for me, I baptize <S%G907><s%> you with water; <S%G5204><s%> but One is coming <S%G2064><s%> who is mightier <S%G2478><s%> than I, and I am <S%G1510><s%> not fit <S%G2425><s%> to untie <S%G3089><s%> the thong <S%G2438><s%> of His sandals; <S%G5266><s%> He will baptize <S%G907><s%> you with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and fire. <S%G4442><s%>

"And His winnowing <S%G4425><s%> fork <S%G4425><s%> is in His hand <S%G5495><s%> to thoroughly <S%G7039><s%> clear <S%G7039><s%> His threshing <S%G257><s%> floor, <S%G257><s%> and to gather <S%G4863><s%> the wheat <S%G4621><s%> into His barn; <S%G596><s%> but He will burn <S%G2618><s%> up the chaff <S%G892><s%> with unquenchable <S%G762><s%> fire. <S%G4442><s%>"
So <S%G3767><s%> with many <S%G4183><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> exhortations <S%G3870><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he preached <S%G2097><s%> the gospel <S%G2097><s%> to the people. <S%G2992><s%>

But when Herod <S%G2264><s%> the tetrarch <S%G5068><s%> was reproved <S%G1651><s%> by him on account <S%G4012><s%> of Herodias, <S%G2266><s%> his brother's wife, <S%G1135><s%> and on account <S%G4012><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> the wicked <S%G4190><s%> things <S%G4190><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> had done, <S%G4160><s%>
he added <S%G4369><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to them all, <S%G3956><s%> that he locked <S%G2623><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> up in prison. <S%G5438><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> it came <S%G1096><s%> about when <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G537><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> were baptized, <S%G907><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was baptized, <S%G907><s%> and while He was praying, <S%G4336><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> was opened, <S%G455><s%>

and the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> descended <S%G2597><s%> upon Him in bodily <S%G4984><s%> form <S%G1491><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a dove, <S%G4058><s%> and a voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> out of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> "Thou art <S%G1510><s%> My beloved <S%G27><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> in Thee I am <S%G2106><s%> well-pleased."

And when He began <S%G757><s%> His ministry, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> was about <S%G5616><s%> thirty <S%G5144><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> of age, <S%G2094><s%> being <S%G1510><s%> supposedly <S%G3543><s%> [the] son <S%G5207><s%> of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> the [son] of Eli, <S%G2242><s%>
the [son] of Matthat, <S%G3158><s%> the [son] of Levi, <S%G3017><s%> the [son] of Melchi, <S%G3197><s%> the [son] of Jannai, <S%G2388><s%> the [son] of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%>
the [son] of Mattathias, <S%G3161><s%> the [son] of Amos, <S%G301><s%> the [son] of Nahum, <S%G3486><s%> the [son] of Hesli, <S%G2069><s%> the [son] of Naggai, <S%G3477><s%>
the [son] of Maath, <S%G3092><s%> the [son] of Mattathias, <S%G3161><s%> the [son] of Semein, <S%G4584><s%> the [son] of Josech, <S%G7100><s%> the [son] of Joda, <S%G7099><s%>
the [son] of Joanan, <S%G7097><s%> the [son] of Rhesa, <S%G4488><s%> the [son] of Zerubbabel, <S%G2216><s%> the [son] of Shealtiel, <S%G4528><s%> the [son] of Neri, <S%G3518><s%>
the [son] of Melchi, <S%G3197><s%> the [son] of Addi, <S%G78><s%> the [son] of Cosam, <S%G2973><s%> the [son] of Elmadam, <S%G1678><s%> the [son] of Er, <S%G2262><s%>
the [son] of Joshua, <S%G2424><s%> the [son] of Eliezer, <S%G1663><s%> the [son] of Jorim, <S%G2497><s%> the [son] of Matthat, <S%G3103><s%> the [son] of Levi, <S%G3017><s%>
the [son] of Simeon, <S%G4826><s%> the [son] of Judah, <S%G2455><s%> the [son] of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> the [son] of Jonam, <S%G2494><s%> the [son] of Eliakim, <S%G1662><s%>
the [son] of Melea, <S%G3190><s%> the [son] of Menna, <S%G3303><s%> the [son] of Mattatha, <S%G3160><s%> the [son] of Nathan, <S%G3481><s%> the [son] of David, <S%G7035><s%>
the [son] of Jesse, <S%G2421><s%> the [son] of Obed, <S%G7098><s%> the [son] of Boaz, <S%G1003><s%> the [son] of Salmon, <S%G4533><s%> the [son] of Nahshon, <S%G3476><s%>

the [son] of Amminadab, <S%G284><s%> the [son] of Admin, <S%G7002><s%> the [son] of Ram, <S%G689><s%> the [son] of Hezron, <S%G2074><s%> the [son] of Perez, <S%G5329><s%> the [son] of Judah, <S%G2455><s%>
the [son] of Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> the [son] of Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> the [son] of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> the [son] of Terah, <S%G2291><s%> the [son] of Nahor, <S%G3493><s%>
the [son] of Serug, <S%G4588><s%> the [son] of Reu, <S%G4466><s%> the [son] of Peleg, <S%G5317><s%> the [son] of Heber, <S%G1443><s%> the [son] of Shelah, <S%G4527><s%>
the [son] of Cainan, <S%G2536><s%> the [son] of Arphaxad, <S%G742><s%> the [son] of Shem, <S%G4590><s%> the [son] of Noah, <S%G3575><s%> the [son] of Lamech, <S%G2984><s%>
the [son] of Methuselah, <S%G3103><s%> the [son] of Enoch, <S%G1802><s%> the [son] of Jared, <S%G2391><s%> the [son] of Mahalaleel, <S%G3121><s%> the [son] of Cainan, <S%G2536><s%>
the [son] of Enosh, <S%G1800><s%> the [son] of Seth, <S%G4589><s%> the [son] of Adam, <S%G76><s%> the [son] of God. <S%G2316><s%>
